colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES N'A RO MKHA' SPYOD MA'I SGRUB THABS RIM GNYIS KYI MAN NGAG BLA BRGYUD SMON LAM DANG BCAS PA CHA TSANG BA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YONGS KYI DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN DPAL DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I MCHOG GRVA BA'I SLOB DPON DKA' CHEN BLO BZANG 'JAM DBYANGS DANG, NOR BU'I DGA' LDAN PA DGA' CHEN DGE LEGS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS NS BSKUL BA LTAR, ^ SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BSTAN 'DZIN MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
